column5: Anybody know off or know how to find out what camps are for sale in Ontario? Any suggestions and or info is greatly appreciated. Thanks.
One site a friend used who sold his camp is www.resortsforsale.com Larry
I would give Terry a call at Borderland Realty.www.ccco.net/borderland/

There is a guy in Dryden by the name of John Ladouceur who works out of Latitude 50 Realty. He seems to have a lot of resorts for sale in the northern Ontario area. I have bookmarked his web site, www.latitude50.on.ca ;-)
